briefTitle: An Efficacy and Safety Study of Extended Release (ER) Tramadol Hydrochloride (HCl)/Acetaminophen in Participants With Chronic Low-Back Pain
officialTitle: A Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel Group, Double-Blind Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Tramadol HCl/Acetaminophen Extended Release Tablet in Subjects With Chronic Low Back Pain
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of extended release (ER) tramadol hydrochloride (HCl)/acetaminophen compared with placebo in participants with chronic (lasting a long time) low-back pain.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Reduction in Pain Intensity
